name: mern-monorepo
description: Full-stack MERN application with monorepo structure

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.deploy: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm start
scripts.test: concurrently --prefix "[{name}]" --names "CLIENT,SERVER" --prefix-colors "green,yellow" "cd client && npm test" "cd server && npm test"
scripts.lint: concurrently --prefix "[{name}]" --names "CLIENT,SERVER" --prefix-colors "green,yellow" "cd client && npm run lint" "cd server && npm run lint"
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf client/node_modules && rm -rf server/node_modules
scripts.run-all: npm run install-all && npm run dev
